.exit
});
  constructorArguments: []
  contract: "contracts/EIP712Bridge.sol:EIP712Bridge",
  address: "0x0Ff4c03C1f13B8f8BB48A68B527a54CDCa43c3F1",
await run("verify:verify", {
art.abi.find(i => i.type === "constructor").inputs
// constructor の入力定義を確認
const art = await artifacts.readArtifact("contracts/EIP712Bridge.sol:EIP712Bridge");
